description: Demonstrates the audible system for real-time cascade steering. Run this cascade and click the 'üèà Audible' button in the UI to inject feedback mid-phase.

inputs_schema.topic: The topic to write about (e.g., 'climate change', 'artificial intelligence')

phases.name: generate_essay
phases.instructions:
Write a comprehensive essay about {{ input.topic }}.

Structure your essay with:
1. An engaging introduction
2. Three main body paragraphs
3. A thoughtful conclusion

Take your time and be thorough. After each paragraph, pause and reflect on what you've written.

IMPORTANT: If you receive feedback during writing (marked with [AUDIBLE]), incorporate it immediately in your next response.

rules.turn_prompt: Continue writing the essay. Review what you've written and expand on it.

phases.name: summarize
